title: TCT Clip: Malcolm Guite on the 'meaning crisis,' past and present
description:
Poet Malcolm Guite talks about our current and past crises of meaning, imagination, and "democracy of the dead."

Full conversation: https://youtu.be/ucKAWNPZGPE

https://www.thecommontoad.com/post/conversations-malcolm-guite-soul-in-paraphrase-heart-in-pilgrimage
